strings.VAPI_ARTIFACT_VARIANCE_DESC: Variant spawn rate is multiplied by {0}
strings.VAPI_ITEM_EXTRAPRIMARY_PICKUP: Gain an additional stack of your primary skill.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_EXTRAPRIMARY_DESC: Gain an additional stack of your primary skill.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_EXTRASECONDARY_PICKUP: Gain an additional stack of your secondary skill.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_EXTRASECONDARY_DESC: Gain an additional stack of your secondary skill.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_EXTRAUTILITY_PICKUP: Gain an additional stack of your utility skill.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_EXTRAUTILITY_DESC: Gain an additional stack of your utility skill.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_EXTRASPECIAL_PICKUP: Gain an additional stack of your special skill.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_EXTRASPECIAL_DESC: Gain an additional stack of your special skill.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_GLOBALCDR_PICKUP: Reduces the cooldowns of ALL your skills by 1%.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_GLOBALCDR_DESC: Reduces the cooldowns of ALL your skills by 1%.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_PRIMARYCDR_PICKUP: Reduces the cooldown of your primary skill by 1%.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_PRIMARYCDR_DESC: Reduces the cooldown of your primary skill by 1%.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_SECONDARYCDR_PICKUP: Reduces the cooldown of your secondary skill by 1%.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_SECONDARYCDR_DESC: Reduces the cooldown of your secondary skill by 1%.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_UTILITYCDR_PICKUP: Reduces the cooldown of your utility skill by 1%.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_UTILITYCDR_DESC: Reduces the cooldown of your utility skill by 1%.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_SPECIALCDR_PICKUP: Reduces the cooldown of your special skill by 1%.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_SPECIALCDR_DESC: Reduces the cooldown of your special skill by 1%.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_PLUS1CRIT_PICKUP: Increases your critical strike chance by 1%.
strings.VAPI_ITEM_PLUS1CRIT_DESC: Increases your critical strike chance by 1%.
strings.VAPI_GENERIC_ARRIVAL: A {0} with unique properties has appeared!
strings.VAPI_RULE_HEADER_VARIANTPACKS_SUBTITLE: Variant Packs are custom Packages of Variants that will provide custom and unique variants to enemies in the game, Each pack can be enabled or disabled.
strings.VAPI_RULE_HEADER_VARIANTS_SUBTITLE: Individual Variants that can spawn in this Run. Each variant may cause you misfortune, fun, or a gruesome death.
strings.VAPI_RULE_VARIANT_ON_DESCRIPTION: This variant will be able to spawn in this Run.
strings.VAPI_RULE_VARIANT_OFF_DESCRIPTION: This variant cannot spawn in this Run.
